title: Diamond player looking for team.
body:
I've played since the end of season 1
Age 16
Roles: Mostly main Support/AD, I can play mid but sort of unable to refine my skill in the role since most the time I find others want the role in soloq , Prefer not to top or jungle.
I can play any champion for Support and for Marksman
IGN: choms 
talk in-game if want to talk
